forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of clouds and sun. High around 65F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny. High 74F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low around 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High around 20C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High near 70F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 6C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 46F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High 12C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 56F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Thunder is possible early. Low around 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Thunder possible. High 11C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers in the morning, becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High 54F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Thunder possible. Low 2C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early mixing with snow showers late. Thunder possible. Low 38F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 53F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 37F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
